column1: Little Goat Diner////After coming here one time
column2: I felt that I need to come back to give The Little Goat another chance. Both food and service were excellent the second time around. My friends and I came on Friday night. We only had to wait thirty minutes for a table for three. I ordered the fish tostadas
column3: which were amazing. My friends had ordered the pork belly with eggs and the sloppy goat
column4: which they both liked very much. Finally
column5: the vanilla milkshake was delicious. Service was excellent this time around. Overall
column6: I would say that depending on what you get and your server for the evening
column7: you can have an okay or an excellent experience. It is definitely worth the time to try this place.
